dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Military planes over Astana? I don't know, that just sounds like routine drills to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Military planes over Astana? I don't know, that just sounds like routine drills to me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it's definitely for the Victory Day parade on May 7th. A local actually shared a video with Tengrinews.kz showing them flying in formation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it's definitely for the Victory Day parade on May seventh. A local actually shared a video with the website showing them flying in formation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Military planes were seen flying over Astana as preparations continue for the upcoming Victory Day parade on May 7. A local resident shared a video with Tengrinews.kz showing various types of military aircraft flying in formation over the capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Huh, but like, are we sure it's not just, uh, some kind of show of force? Seems a bit much.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh, but like, are we sure it's not just, uh, some kind of show of force? Seems a bit much.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: No, no—it's commemorating the 80th anniversary of the Great Patriotic War. They're expecting over 4,000 service members to take part.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no-it's commemorating the eightieth anniversary of the Great Patriotic War. They're expecting over four thousand service members to take part.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The large-scale parade will mark the 80th anniversary of Victory in the Great Patriotic War and will feature over 4,000 service members.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Four thousand? That's… a lot of people for one parade, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Four thousand? That's... a lot of people for one parade, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well yeah, it's a huge event! They do this every year, but this one's especially big because of the anniversary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well yeah, it's a huge event! They do this every year, but this one's especially big because of the anniversary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I guess so, but still—military aircraft in formation? That feels like it's sending a message beyond just celebration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess so, but still-military aircraft in formation? That feels like it's sending a message beyond just celebration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, maybe a little, but honestly it's mostly about honoring veterans. The scale is impressive though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, maybe a little, but honestly it's mostly about honoring veterans. The scale is impressive though.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do they usually have flyovers like this in Astana?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do they usually have flyovers like this in Astana?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For Victory Day, absolutely. It's kind of a tradition at this point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For Victory Day, absolutely. It's kind of a tradition at this point.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, okay. I still wonder about the cost of all that, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, okay. I still wonder about the cost of all that, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh for sure, it's not cheap. But they see it as an important symbol of national pride.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh for sure, it's not cheap. But they see it as an important symbol of national pride.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Fair enough. I suppose if it brings people together…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fair enough. I suppose if it brings people together...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the video going around really shows how coordinated everything is. Pretty cool to watch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the video going around really shows how coordinated everything is. Pretty cool to watch.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, you've convinced me—it sounds like a meaningful event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, you've convinced me-it sounds like a meaningful event.
